channel.title: How do you increase a weapons damage?
channel.description: Like currently my vesta longsword blows. It does less damage then a dds it seems.. i need to increase it by like 100-200 percent more

item.title: How do you increase a weapons damage?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Ugh ok I’m a spoon feeder. Message team viewer details?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you increase a weapons damage?

item.title: How do you increase a weapons damage?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

1: Shop Price 2: Low Alch Value 3: High Alch Value 4: Stab Att Boost 5: Slash Att Boost 6: Crush Att Boost 7: Magic Att Boost 8: Range Att Boost 9: Stab Def Boost 10: Slash Def Boost 11: Crush Def Boost 12: Magic Def Boost 13: Range Def Boost 14: Strength Boost 15: Prayer Boost

Those are what the item.cfg numbers mean. Change them to your liking. And what base are you using? PI, Delta?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you increase a weapons damage?

the str bonus on it should work to make it do more damage

item.title: How do you increase a weapons damage?
item.dc:creator: @Fierystr Fierystr
item.description:
@Fierystr wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:7, topic:394856"][quote author=Fierystr link=topic=492046.msg3598138#msg3598138 date=1305324895]

“Item.CFG” and change the bonuses.

How do I know which ones to change? There are like 8 numbers…
[/quote]

What’s the point in trying when you don’t know what to do.

OnTopic: Look at the bonuses ingame, and then check them in Item.CFG[/quote]

No it’s cuz I don’t know what to change to do more damage in the item.cfg…

Read full topic
